Compute ASDSF across chains using clades from a target tree

Source: R/diagnostics.R
compute_target_tree_asdsf.Rd

Compute ASDSF across chains using clades from a target tree

Usage

compute_target_tree_asdsf(
  phy_target,
  edge_list_chains,
  rooted = TRUE,
  normalize = TRUE,
  ncores = 1,
  min_freq = 0
)

Arguments

phy_target

A rooted phylo object defining the reference clades. Assumed to be in postorder.

edge_list_chains

List of chains, each a list of edge matrices (2-column integer matrices).

rooted

Logical; treat trees as rooted when matching clades. Default TRUE.

normalize

Logical; pass through to prop_clades_par (default TRUE).

min_freq

Minimum clade frequency threshold used when averaging SDs. Default 0.1.

Value

A list with elements asdsf, per_clade_sd, keep_mask, and freq_matrix.
